text: good news: we can do this
bad news: the bot can’t read retroactively
it also cannot (in real time) gather past messages
we have to add it to the group, give it admin privileges and then every message going forward it can read, but then we need to save it to a file or DB of some kind

I’ve created a new protocol that will be better than Lightning network
To take funda off bitcoin, create a private place for people to buy beef jerky, and then roll up all these payments into an ordinal
And the ordinal inscription is a picture of my cat
Check out my whitepaper at https://catjerky.network
This is crazy! Alex just launched this Last Pay Wins thing https://www.lastpaywins.com/
Basically, there is a timer...you pay a lightning invoice, and it resets the timer
Last person to pay after timer hits zero wins the jackpot
Its basically like a game of chicken, but with bitcoin
I've been helping extend liquidity to it with my lightning node dlntr1, and Nitesh is extending liquidity with his NodeRunner node
Gambling is a team sport in Atlanta lol
